regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 return '$doregex[fUrl]'+re.findall('"token".+?"(\?[^"]+)',page_data)[0].replace('\\','')+'|user-agent=ipad&referer=http://www.tufmpy.com/2016/10/red-guarani-en-vivo-canal-2-paraguay.html'

regex.name: fUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 return re.findall('"hls".+?"(h[^"]+)',page_data)[0].replace('\\','')

regex.name: IDs
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 return re.findall('"video-container"[\w\W]*?id="(\d+[^"]+)',page_data)[0].replace('_','/')
